# MPBL sportsmanship award__disambig_1

The MPBL sportsmanship award is an annual Maharlika Pilipinas Basketball League award given to the player who has shown sportsmanlike behavior throughout the season. It was first awarded during the 2018–19 MPBL season.
As of 2024, three players have won the award with Jay-R Taganas receiving the award in three of the four occasions. Billy Ray Robles and Nikko Panganiban are the only other recipients, having won the award in 2020 and 2024, respectively.
